ingredients.ingredient: 1 fresh pineapple - peeled, cored, and chopped
½ large cucumber, peeled and diced
½ teaspoon chile-lime seasoning (such as Tajin®), or more to taste

cookingTips: Prepare fruit just before serving to maintain freshness and color
Toss with lemon juice immediately to prevent browning
Sprinkle chile-lime seasoning just before serving for brightness
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Show the user how to prepare fresh fruit, combine in a bowl, dress with fresh lemon juice, and finish with chile-lime seasoning for a spicy-sweet salad.
